A family company dynamically developing in the TSL trade.

FHU ROLEWICZ

A family company dynamically developing in the TSL trade. We provide comprehensive transport and freight forwarding services, offering both domestic and international transport. We are characterized by commitment to each service entrusted to us and timeliness of performed commissions.

We guarantee professional advice and excellent information flow due to the high availability of our employees. Our main advantage is a delivery just in time. We cooperate with both long-term contracts and one off orders.

ADVANTAGES

Individual approach

Having a wide range of services provided, we're able to adapt the offer and fleet of vehicles to the customer’s requirements from each economic sector as well as private customers, while maintaining price competitiveness.

Inquire Now

Security

The fleet is equipped with a GPS system which traces the location of the load at all time. We are a fully licenced transport and spedition company, thus all activities are covered by CMR, Cabotage, and Spedition Insurace. We guarantee confidentiality.

Inquire Now

Timeliness of deliveries

We specialize in timely and express deliveries. We deliver the goods entrusted to us within 24 hours between any two EU countries.

Inquire Now

Experience

Our qualified staff has many years of experience in the national and international transport and forwarding trade. Our dynamically developing team focuses on raising their professional competences and expanding the fleet. Thanks to our experience we find the best solution for our customers.

Inquire Now

Availability

Owing to the fact that we're a family business, we are available for our clients 24 hours a day, 7 days a week.

Inquire Now

Fleet of vehicles

We provide a high quality of fleet and qualified drivers, which assures proper security.

Inquire Now

OUR SERVICES

We offer a wide range of road transport and spedition services:

Transport FTL Full Truck Loaded

Services using a dedicated truck, individually matched to the type of cargo. It's the safest and most efficient tranport arrangment.

Transport LTL Less Than Full Truck Loaded

In order to minimize the costs of transport we suggest sharing a single mode of transport among multiple individual pieces of cargo.

Express transport Domestic and International

We are experts at express transport. if you need to make delivery as soon as possible, or just in time, we will be there. Loading and delivery in the same day? - No problem. Delivery next day first opening hour - we love to do that.

Cabotage transport Domestic and International

We specialize in cabotage transport in the area of Europe Union, mainly in France, Germany, Spain, Portugal, UK, Italy and Benelux (Holland, Belgium, Luxemburg).
